cu.explanation_en: Setting the hardware log level to an invalid enum like 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors and may prevent proper hardware logging.

du.explanation_en: Setting the PRACH msg1 frequency start to 100 is out of the valid range and may cause RACH configuration failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 PRACH msg1 頻率起始設定為 100 超出有效範圍，可能導致 RACH 配置失敗。
